text: The One Love Tennis Open is a tournament for professional female tennis players played on outdoor hard courts. The event is classified as a $50,000 ITF Women's Circuit tournament and has been held in Atlanta, United States, since 2016. == Past finals == === Singles === {|class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2016 || Elise Mertens || Melanie Oudin || 6–4, 6–2 |} === Doubles === {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champions !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2016 || Ingrid Neel Luisa Stefani || Alexandra Stevenson Taylor Townsend ||4–6, 6–4, [10–5] |} == External links == * Official website * ITF search One Love Tennis Open Category:Hard court tennis tournaments in the United States Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2016 Category:Tennis in Georgia (U.S. state)
title: One Love Tennis Open
